page.title: 11CLUTTON'S STEEPLEJACKS
page.content: The nationally known firm of Dawson Steeplejacks is based in Clutton. It is a family business which was started years ago by the present Mr. Dawson's father. They have a head office in Bristol now and offices around the country. They have worked on many famous buildings such as Windsor Castle and Lincoln Cathedral. {An Interview with Mr. Dawson We asked Mr. Dawson how long it took to build the old chimney in Clutton. It took 8 weeks in 1916. He said that the wind and heights are the most dangerous part of the job. His father first made him go up a ladder when he was 4 years old. Dawson Steeplejacks work on radio masts,chimneys,church spires and monuments.They use ladders and safety ropes to climb.Mr.Dawson's sons and daughter are going to carry on the business.
